languages.text: Странная конструкция, над которой изрядно поизмывались — кто-то целенаправленно уродовал ее и отбивал куски, вымещая свой гнев на мертвом металле.
A strange construction that has been extensively vandalised — someone purposefully disfigured it and beat off the pieces, taking out their anger on the dead metal.
languages.original_text: Странная конструкция, над которой изрядно поизмывались — кто-то целенаправленно уродовал ее и отбивал куски, вымещая свой гнев на мертвом металле.

traits.locale_text: A strange construction that has been extensively vandalised — someone purposefully disfigured it and beat off the pieces, taking out their anger on the dead metal.
A strange construction that has been extensively vandalised — someone purposefully disfigured it and beat off the pieces, taking out their anger on the dead metal.
A strange construction that has been extensively vandalised — someone purposefully disfigured it and beat off the pieces, taking out their anger on the dead metal.

languages.text: Una construcción extraña que ha quedado totalmente deformada: alguien la ha desfigurado a propósito y ha machacado sus piezas, desahogando su ira contra el metal muerto.
languages.original_text: A strange construction that has been extensively vandalised — someone purposefully disfigured it and beat off the pieces, taking out their anger on the dead metal.

traits.locale_text: Una construcción extraña que ha quedado totalmente deformada: alguien la ha desfigurado a propósito y ha machacado sus piezas, desahogando su ira contra el metal muerto.

languages.text: 这座古怪的造物遭到了彻底破坏，不知什么人故意毁坏了它的外观，将它的零件拆解下来，将怒火发泄在这些毫无生机的金属上。
languages.original_text: A strange construction that has been extensively vandalised — someone purposefully disfigured it and beat off the pieces, taking out their anger on the dead metal.

traits.locale_text: 这座古怪的造物遭到了彻底破坏，不知什么人故意毁坏了它的外观，将它的零件拆解下来，将怒火发泄在这些毫无生机的金属上。

languages.text: ひどく破壊された奇妙な建造物…怒りをその死んだ金属にぶつけるように、何者かがわざと形を崩して粉々にしたのだ。
languages.original_text: A strange construction that has been extensively vandalised — someone purposefully disfigured it and beat off the pieces, taking out their anger on the dead metal.

traits.locale_text: ひどく破壊された奇妙な建造物…怒りをその死んだ金属にぶつけるように、何者かがわざと形を崩して粉々にしたのだ。

languages.text: Une étrange construction profondément vandalisée. Quelqu'un l'a délibérément défigurée et mise en pièces dans un accès de rage.
languages.original_text: A strange construction that has been extensively vandalised — someone purposefully disfigured it and beat off the pieces, taking out their anger on the dead metal.

traits.locale_text: Une étrange construction profondément vandalisée. Quelqu'un l'a délibérément défigurée et mise en pièces dans un accès de rage.

languages.text: Eine seltsame Konstruktion, die umfassend beschädigt wurde – jemand hat sie absichtlich entstellt und Teile davon abgeschlagen, vielleicht um seine Wut an dem toten Metall auszulassen.
languages.original_text: A strange construction that has been extensively vandalised — someone purposefully disfigured it and beat off the pieces, taking out their anger on the dead metal.

traits.locale_text: Eine seltsame Konstruktion, die umfassend beschädigt wurde – jemand hat sie absichtlich entstellt und Teile davon abgeschlagen, vielleicht um seine Wut an dem toten Metall auszulassen.

languages.text: Büyük ölçüde tahrip edilmiş garip bir yapı. Birisi sanki hıncını cansız metalden almaya kalkmış gibi kasıtlı olarak paramparça etmiş.
languages.original_text: A strange construction that has been extensively vandalised — someone purposefully disfigured it and beat off the pieces, taking out their anger on the dead metal.
